--INSTALLATION "Welcome " TEA KIDS Terms and Conditions By clicking Next, you accept the Terms and Conditions of TEA KIDS Next Direct access Anyone can access to TEA KIDS app and use it in different media (without previous authorization) for non-profit activities. All TEA KIDS rights are exclusive of the University of El Salvador therefore, the institution is not responsible for the inappropriate use of the app. The use of TEA KIDS doesn’t replace a language therapy.

--mensajes Alert Are you sure to eliminate Are you sure to remove the Category of: Are you sure to eliminate the Everyday Skill of: Delete Close This category cannot be eliminated, there are: pictograms used in everyday skills pictograms used in interactive games Are you sure? The Pictogram Category will be removed with all its images This pictogram cannot be removed, pictogram used in: everyday skills interactive games The pictogram will be removed it is empty Required field You must add an image before saving Saved Image Select an option Take Picture Load Image Select the Application There are no pictograms It is necessary to fill the required fields No people have been added to the list Password updated successfully Passwords must be equal Mail Sent Successfully The code is incorrect Incorrect password Empty field, enter the password Enter password to continue Saved session Enter the password to DISCARD the session Discarded session Resumed session Comment Updated Selected Options There is no category for everyday skills To view you must add at least one pictogram. You must add a name. Saved Everyday Skill You must enter a comment. Create Sequence Edit Sequence Are you sure to delete the Game: You must add pictograms to the answer options. You must mark at least one option as correct. The title must be less than 30 characters. You must enter a title for the question. End of the game! Well done! You must enter a Game title. The title must be less than 25 characters. You have already reached the maximum of 10 questions, you cannot create more. Delete Question The question will be removed from the current game Do you want to continue? Saved Correctly. This question has no options, press the edit button to add options. Saved Level Successfully Updated Level Delete Level The level will be removed from the current game. Do you want to continue? Level Add
--JUEGOS INTERACTIVOS Game Name New Game Write the title of the question Write a name for your game Save Question New Question Question Title Game Title End of the game Continue Well done! This game does not have questions yet, you can add some by pressing the button below My Games MENU OPTION: Interactive Games GAME CATEGORY: GAME: N° of failures: Memory Game Results MENU OPTION: PHRASES You need to log out Access to Interactive Games Use your fingerprint to enter this option Use Password Finish
